Operation 'Policy_Evaluate' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Original description uses vague language ('consults', 'checks') and doesn't clarify what is returned. Enhanced description specifies the input schema reference, explains the matching behavior, clarifies the return value (list of matching policies), and provides domain context about use cases (price/promotion validation). This helps AI agents understand when to use this operation and what to expect.

data.current_description: This endpoint consults all policies and checks the ones that satisfy the request body's conditions.
data.description_suggestion: Evaluates all policies against provided conditions to identify which policies match the specified criteria. Accepts conditions in the request body (see EvaluatePolicyRequest schema) and returns a list of policies that satisfy those conditions. This operation is used to determine which price and promotion policies apply to a given scenario without modifying any policies.
data.reasoning: Original description uses vague language ('consults', 'checks') and doesn't clarify what is returned. Enhanced description specifies the input schema reference, explains the matching behavior, clarifies the return value (list of matching policies), and provides domain context about use cases (price/promotion validation). This helps AI agents understand when to use this operation and what to expect.

message: Operation 'Policy_CreateOrUpdate' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, not_actionable. Original summary only mentions 'Create' but the operation actually supports both create and update (as indicated by the License Manager resource 'Create or Update Policy' and the POST method with ID parameter). Description is too minimal and doesn't explain the upsert behavior or what the request body contains. Enhanced version clarifies the dual functionality, references the input schema, explains the ID-based behavior, and specifies the return value. This helps AI agents understand when to use this operation and its actual capabilities.

data.current_description: Creates a new policy from scratch.
data.summary_suggestion: Create or update policy by ID
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new policy or updates an existing policy identified by the provided ID. Accepts policy configuration in the request body (see PolicySaveRequest schema) including conditions and actions for price and promotion validation. If the policy ID does not exist, a new policy is created. If it exists, the existing policy is replaced. Returns the created or updated policy object.
data.reasoning: Original summary only mentions 'Create' but the operation actually supports both create and update (as indicated by the License Manager resource 'Create or Update Policy' and the POST method with ID parameter). Description is too minimal and doesn't explain the upsert behavior or what the request body contains. Enhanced version clarifies the dual functionality, references the input schema, explains the ID-based behavior, and specifies the return value. This helps AI agents understand when to use this operation and its actual capabilities.

message: Operation 'Policy_Update' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is acceptable but description lacks specificity. Original description doesn't explain what gets updated, what the request body contains, or what is returned. Enhanced description specifies the input schema reference, clarifies that the entire policy is replaced (not partial updates), explains the return value, and provides domain context. This helps AI agents understand the operation's scope and effects.

data.current_description: Updates an existing policy at your account.
data.description_suggestion: Updates an existing policy identified by its ID with new configuration. Accepts policy updates in the request body (see PolicySaveRequest schema) including conditions and actions for price and promotion validation. Returns the updated policy object. The operation replaces the entire policy configuration with the provided values.
data.reasoning: Summary is acceptable but description lacks specificity. Original description doesn't explain what gets updated, what the request body contains, or what is returned. This helps AI agents understand the operation's scope and effects.
